More About me

As a backend developer, I specialize in building and maintaining the servers, databases, and APIs that power web and mobile applications. With a strong foundation in programming languages such as Python, Java, and PHP, I am skilled at developing efficient and scalable solutions to complex problems. I am also experienced in working with database technologies such as MySQL, MongoDB, and PostgreSQL, and have a track record of success in designing and implementing secure and performant database architectures. In addition to my technical skills, I am a strong communicator and collaborator, and enjoy working closely with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality products on time.
